info.name: Contact360 GraphQL API - Complete
info.description:
Complete GraphQL API collection for Contact360 Appointment service.

**Setup:**
1. Import this collection
2. Create environment with baseUrl
3. Use Auth > Login to get token
4. Token auto-saves to environment

**Modules:** All 25 GraphQL modules included

**ðŸ“š For comprehensive module documentation**, see docs/GraphQL/README.md which includes detailed queries, mutations, validation rules, error handling, and implementation details for each module.

request.description: Get current authenticated user. Returns null if unauthenticated. See docs/GraphQL/01_AUTH_MODULE.md#me for details.
Get current session information. Requires authentication. See docs/GraphQL/01_AUTH_MODULE.md#session for details.
Login - Mutation
Register - Mutation
Logout - Mutation
Refresh Token - Mutation
Get user by UUID. Users can view their own profile; Admins can view any user. See docs/GraphQL/02_USERS_MODULE.md#user for validation rules and role-based access.
List Users - Query
User Stats - Query
Update Profile - Mutation
Uploads a user avatar image. The fileData field should contain base64-encoded image data (without data URI prefix). File requirements:JPEG, PNG, GIF, or WebP; Maximum size:5MB.
Promote a user to Admin role. Requires SuperAdmin role.
Promote a user to SuperAdmin role. Requires SuperAdmin role.
Get API metadata (name, version, docs URL). Public access. See docs/GraphQL/08_HEALTH_MODULE.md#apimetadata for details.
API Health - Query
VQL Health - Query
Performance Stats - Query
List jobs with filters. See docs/GraphQL/24_JOBS_MODULE.md#jobs for validation rules and implementation details.
Get Job - Query
Get Upload URL - Query
Get Export Download URL - Query
Create Job - Mutation
Create a CSV export job with VQL query. Poll job status, then get download URL when completed.
List import jobs with filters. See docs/GraphQL/25_IMPORTS_MODULE.md#importjobs for validation rules and implementation details.
Get Import Job - Query
Create a CSV import job. First get upload URL from Jobs module, upload file to S3, then create import job with the S3 key. Service can be 'contact' or 'company'.
Get contact by UUID with full company data. Requires authentication. See docs/GraphQL/03_CONTACTS_MODULE.md#contact for validation rules and implementation details.
Basic contact listing with pagination
Contact Count - Query
Flexible name search with typo tolerance (shuffle search type)
Exact phrase matching for job titles
Find verified contacts in specific departments
Find contacts created in a specific date range

item.name: Denormalized Company Fields - High Value Companies

request.description: Filter contacts by company attributes using denormalized company_* fields (single query, no separate company query needed)
Get contacts with populated company objects. Use company_* fields for filtering, companyConfig.selectColumns for response data.
Initial request for cursor-based pagination. Extract values from last document for searchAfter.
Next page using search_after cursor. Replace values with actual values from last document of previous response.
Complex filtering combining text search, keyword filters, and date range
Find high-quality leads for outreach - combines company and contact filters
Find decision-makers at target companies for account-based marketing
Find engineering candidates with specific skills and company technologies
Advanced VQL query with custom filters
Get available filters for contacts. Service is automatically set to 'contact'.
Get filter values for a specific filter key. Service is automatically set to 'contact'. See docs/GraphQL/03_CONTACTS_MODULE.md#filterdata for details.

Create a new contact via Connectra. Requires authentication. See docs/GraphQL/03_CONTACTS_MODULE.md#createcontact for validation rules (email format, max 255 chars for fields) and implementation details.
Update an existing contact. Currently raises NotImplementedError. See docs/GraphQL/03_CONTACTS_MODULE.md#updatecontact for details.
Delete a contact. Currently raises NotImplementedError. See docs/GraphQL/03_CONTACTS_MODULE.md#deletecontact for details.

Create multiple contacts in batch (max 1000, processed in chunks of 100). Requires authentication. See docs/GraphQL/03_CONTACTS_MODULE.md#batchcreatecontacts for validation rules and batch processing details.
Get company by UUID. Requires authentication. See docs/GraphQL/04_COMPANIES_MODULE.md#company for validation rules and implementation details.
Basic company listing with pagination
Flexible company name search with typo tolerance (shuffle search type)
Exact phrase matching for industries
Find companies in specific industries using specific technologies
Find mid-size companies by employee count range
Find high-value companies by revenue and funding
Complex filtering combining text search, keyword filters, and numeric ranges
Initial request for cursor-based pagination. Extract values from last document for searchAfter.
Next page using search_after cursor. Replace values with actual values from last document of previous response.
Build target account list for account-based marketing - ideal company size, revenue, and tech stack
Find competitors by name, industry, and technology stack for competitive analysis
Find partnership opportunities - complementary companies in similar industries with compatible tech stacks
Find companies in target geographic regions for expansion planning
Advanced VQL query with custom filters
Company Contacts - Query
Get available filters for companies. Service is automatically set to 'company'.
Get filter values for a specific filter key. Service is automatically set to 'company'. See docs/GraphQL/04_COMPANIES_MODULE.md#filterdata for details.
Create a new company via Connectra batch upsert. Requires authentication. See docs/GraphQL/04_COMPANIES_MODULE.md#createcompany for validation rules and implementation details.
Update an existing company via Connectra batch upsert. Requires authentication. See docs/GraphQL/04_COMPANIES_MODULE.md#updatecompany for validation rules and implementation details.
Delete a company. Currently raises NotImplementedError as Connectra API does not support company deletion. See docs/GraphQL/04_COMPANIES_MODULE.md#deletecompany for details.
List user notifications with filters. See docs/GraphQL/05_NOTIFICATIONS_MODULE.md#notifications for validation rules (pagination limits, type enum) and implementation details.
Get Notification - Query
Unread Count - Query
Notification Preferences - Query
Mark Notification Read - Mutation
Mark All Read - Mutation
Delete Notification - Mutation
Get export by ID. See docs/GraphQL/06_EXPORTS_MODULE.md#export for validation rules (UUID format) and implementation details.
List Exports - Query
Export Status - Query
Create Contact Export - Mutation
Create Company Export - Mutation
List CSV files in S3. See docs/GraphQL/07_S3_MODULE.md#s3files for validation rules (prefix max 500 chars) and implementation details.
Get S3 File Data - Query
Get S3 File Info - Query
Find emails by name and domain. See docs/GraphQL/15_EMAIL_MODULE.md#findemails for validation rules (name max 100 chars, domain max 255 chars) and credit costs.
Find Single Email - Mutation
Verify Single Email - Mutation
Verify Bulk Emails - Mutation
Create Plan - Mutation
Update Plan - Mutation
Delete Plan - Mutation
Create Plan Period - Mutation
Update Plan Period - Mutation
Delete Plan Period - Mutation
Create Addon - Mutation
Update Addon - Mutation
Delete Addon - Mutation
Get current user billing information. See docs/GraphQL/14_BILLING_MODULE.md#billing for details.
Get Plans - Query
Get Addons - Query
List Invoices - Query
Subscribe - Mutation
Purchase Addon - Mutation
Cancel Subscription - Mutation
Get current feature usage. Auto-creates records if missing, performs monthly resets. See docs/GraphQL/09_USAGE_MODULE.md#usage for role-based limits and implementation details.
Track Usage - Mutation
Reset Usage - Mutation
List user activities with filters. See docs/GraphQL/11_ACTIVITIES_MODULE.md#activities for validation rules (pagination, enum validation, date ranges) and implementation details.
Activity Stats - Query

item.name: AI Chats

request.description: List AI chats with pagination and filters. See docs/GraphQL/17_AI_CHATS_MODULE.md#aichats for validation rules and implementation details.
Get AI Chat - Query
Create AI Chat - Mutation
Send Message - Mutation
Analyze Email Risk - Mutation
Generate Company Summary - Mutation
Parse Contact Filters - Mutation

item.description: AI Chats module - Queries and Mutations

request.description: Get performance metrics with filters. See docs/GraphQL/18_ANALYTICS_MODULE.md#performancemetrics for validation rules (limit 1-1000, date range) and implementation details.
Aggregate Metrics - Query
Submit Performance Metric - Mutation
Search contacts/companies by LinkedIn URL. See docs/GraphQL/21_LINKEDIN_MODULE.md#search for validation rules (URL format, max 2048 chars) and credit costs.
Export LinkedIn Results - Mutation

item.name: Sales Navigator

request.description: List Sales Navigator scraping records. See docs/GraphQL/23_SALES_NAVIGATOR_MODULE.md for details.

Save profiles array to Connectra database via bulk upsert operations. Creates or updates contacts and companies based on the provided profile data. Returns success status, total profiles count, saved count (contacts created + contacts updated), and any errors.

item.description: Sales Navigator module - Queries and Mutations

request.description: List all users (Admin/SuperAdmin only). See docs/GraphQL/13_ADMIN_MODULE.md#users for validation rules and role-based access.
User Stats (Admin) - Query
Search Logs - Query
Update User Role - Mutation
Update User Credits - Mutation

item.name: Dashboard Pages

request.description: Get dashboard page with role-based filtering. See docs/GraphQL/19_DASHBOARD_PAGES_MODULE.md#dashboardpage for validation rules (pageId max 255) and implementation details.
List Dashboard Pages - Query
Create Dashboard Page - Mutation

item.description: Dashboard Pages module - Queries and Mutations

request.description: Get documentation page metadata. Public access. See docs/GraphQL/20_DOCUMENTATION_MODULE.md#documentationpage for details.
List Documentation Pages - Query
Get documentation page markdown content from S3. Public access. See docs/GraphQL/20_DOCUMENTATION_MODULE.md#documentationpagecontent for details.

Create a new documentation page. Requires Admin or SuperAdmin role. See docs/GraphQL/20_DOCUMENTATION_MODULE.md#createdocumentationpage for validation rules (pageId max 255, title max 500, content max 100000) and implementation details.
Update an existing documentation page. Requires Admin or SuperAdmin role. See docs/GraphQL/20_DOCUMENTATION_MODULE.md#updatedocumentationpage for validation rules and implementation details.
Delete a documentation page. Requires Admin or SuperAdmin role. See docs/GraphQL/20_DOCUMENTATION_MODULE.md#deletedocumentationpage for validation rules and implementation details.
Get marketing page. Public access, returns only published pages. See docs/GraphQL/22_MARKETING_MODULE.md#marketingpage for details.
List all marketing pages. Public access, returns only published pages. See docs/GraphQL/22_MARKETING_MODULE.md#marketingpages for details.
Create a new marketing page. Requires Admin or SuperAdmin role. See docs/GraphQL/22_MARKETING_MODULE.md#createmarketingpage for validation rules (pageId max 255) and implementation details.
Update an existing marketing page. Requires Admin or SuperAdmin role. See docs/GraphQL/22_MARKETING_MODULE.md#updatemarketingpage for validation rules and implementation details.
Delete a marketing page. Requires Admin or SuperAdmin role. See docs/GraphQL/22_MARKETING_MODULE.md#deletemarketingpage for validation rules and implementation details.
Publish a marketing page (set status to 'published'). Requires Admin or SuperAdmin role. See docs/GraphQL/22_MARKETING_MODULE.md#publishmarketingpage for details.
Unpublish a marketing page (set status to 'draft'). Requires Admin or SuperAdmin role. See docs/GraphQL/22_MARKETING_MODULE.md#unpublishmarketingpage for details.

item.name: Saved Searches

request.description: List saved searches for the current user with optional type filter and pagination. See docs/GraphQL/26_SAVED_SEARCHES_MODULE.md#listsavedsearches for validation rules (limit 1-1000, type:contact/company/all) and implementation details.
Get a specific saved search by ID. Users can only access their own saved searches. See docs/GraphQL/26_SAVED_SEARCHES_MODULE.md#getsavedsearch for validation rules and implementation details.

Create a new saved search. See docs/GraphQL/26_SAVED_SEARCHES_MODULE.md#createsavedsearch for validation rules (name max 255, description max 1000, type:contact/company/all) and implementation details.
Update an existing saved search. Users can only update their own saved searches. See docs/GraphQL/26_SAVED_SEARCHES_MODULE.md#updatesavedsearch for validation rules and implementation details.
Delete a saved search. Users can only delete their own saved searches. See docs/GraphQL/26_SAVED_SEARCHES_MODULE.md#deletesavedsearch for validation rules and implementation details.

Update the last used timestamp and increment use count for a saved search. Users can only update usage for their own saved searches. See docs/GraphQL/26_SAVED_SEARCHES_MODULE.md#updatesavedsearchusage for validation rules and implementation details.

item.description: Saved Searches module - Queries and Mutations

item.name: Two-Factor Authentication

request.description: Get the current 2FA status for the authenticated user. See docs/GraphQL/27_TWO_FACTOR_MODULE.md#get2fastatus for implementation details.

Setup 2FA for the current user. Generates a TOTP secret, QR code, and backup codes. Secret and backup codes are shown only once - store them securely. See docs/GraphQL/27_TWO_FACTOR_MODULE.md#setup2fa for implementation details and production notes.
Verify a 2FA code during setup or login. Enables 2FA if verification succeeds. See docs/GraphQL/27_TWO_FACTOR_MODULE.md#verify2fa for validation rules and implementation details.
Disable 2FA for the current user. Requires password or backup code verification. See docs/GraphQL/27_TWO_FACTOR_MODULE.md#disable2fa for validation rules and implementation details.

Regenerate backup codes for the current user. Invalidates all previous backup codes. New backup codes are shown only once - store them securely. See docs/GraphQL/27_TWO_FACTOR_MODULE.md#regeneratebackupcodes for validation rules and implementation details.

item.description: Two-Factor Authentication module - Queries and Mutations

request.description: List all API keys for the current user. Full keys are never returned (only prefix for display). See docs/GraphQL/28_PROFILE_MODULE.md#listapikeys for implementation details.
List all active sessions for the current user. Only active sessions are returned. See docs/GraphQL/28_PROFILE_MODULE.md#listsessions for implementation details.
List all team members for the current user's team. Only team owners can view their team members. See docs/GraphQL/28_PROFILE_MODULE.md#listteammembers for implementation details.

Create a new API key for the current user. Full key is returned only once - store it securely. See docs/GraphQL/28_PROFILE_MODULE.md#createapikey for validation rules (name max 255) and security notes.
Delete an API key. Users can only delete their own API keys. See docs/GraphQL/28_PROFILE_MODULE.md#deleteapikey for validation rules and implementation details.
Revoke (logout) a specific session. Users can only revoke their own sessions. See docs/GraphQL/28_PROFILE_MODULE.md#revokesession for validation rules and implementation details.
Revoke all sessions except the current one. Useful for security when user suspects account compromise. See docs/GraphQL/28_PROFILE_MODULE.md#revokeallothersessions for implementation details.

Invite a new team member. Only team owners can invite members. Email notifications are not yet implemented. See docs/GraphQL/28_PROFILE_MODULE.md#inviteteammember for validation rules (email format, role max 50) and implementation details.
Update a team member's role. Only team owners can update member roles. See docs/GraphQL/28_PROFILE_MODULE.md#updateteammemberrole for validation rules (role max 50) and implementation details.
Remove a team member from the team. Only team owners can remove members. See docs/GraphQL/28_PROFILE_MODULE.md#removeteammember for validation rules and implementation details.
Get multipart upload session status. See docs/GraphQL/10_UPLOAD_MODULE.md#uploadstatus for validation rules (uploadId max 200) and implementation details.
Get Presigned URL - Query
Initiate Upload - Mutation
Complete Upload - Mutation
